content: For folks participating in the Bulk Data Connectathon track, please add your name to the sign up sheet.
If you're bringing a server or client for folks to test, please add the details to the tracking spreadsheet so other participants can find it.
Information on the track scenarios and background on the bulk data project more generally (including an overview presentation and slides) are on the Connectathon wiki page.
Looking forward to speaking with everyone at our kickoff session at 10am ET this morning - join via the Whova app!
What time (and timezone) is the sync this afternoon?
Hey All, just wanted to gauge who else is interested in Bulk Data Import. Maybe we could have a break out room later today/tomorrow?

It's time for our 3pm check-in! Let folks know what you're working on and we can talk through any issues you've run into. Also, if you didn't make the kickoff this morning, come and introduce yourself to the track!
Re: discovery of server capabilities, https://github.com/HL7/bulk-data/pull/77 represents our incremental step to document these.
Right now the only automated discovery (in .well-known) is for security features

Reminder - we'll be having a check-in session at 10am ET. Come with your bulk data questions, requests for collaborators, success stories, etc! Also, for folks who have a server listed on the spreadsheet, please plan to say a few words about your server and how folks can connect.
Will there be a check-in at 3pm ET today? That would be the same time as the main wrap up for the Connectathon.
I thought the main wrap up is scheduled fro 6:30pm ET - where did you see 3pm?
Woops, I'm moving a time to my time zone that already had been moved to my time zone. It is set for 6pm ET in Whova and I forgot it accounted for time zone already.

I put together a shared document for our report out to the rest of the Connectathon at https://docs.google.com/document/d/1swUPP0VVHnW3BXa3NoWlrF7lKlqi-tRDcd1b5tDtb04/edit?usp=sharing. Please add your Connectathon achievements, discoveries and next steps to the highlighted section prior to our 3pm check-in. Also, feel free to edit other sections if something looks off. Thanks!
I opened an issue around the request url returned for POST requests: https://github.com/HL7/bulk-data/issues/89
